name: Thalyson A. Rodrigues
title: Have an idea and want to develop it?
apresentation: I work with the web for 2 years, and program software for 4 years. I started with the Pascal language and improved myself by learning Java, Web Stack (HTML5, CSS3, JS), PHP, Delphi and Database. If you have a project in mind, small or large you can contact me for a quote. I am starting and my focus is to gain experience!
